title: Klp1122
author: Klp1122
content: All of us bounty hunters are deciding thatCrypto managementTelegram group: https://t.me/cryptoworldmanagment @cmwhelper @AndroidV2 @CWM112 This team doesn't give us any payment for our workChampian name:(    Tofycoin Bounty Campaign,Bitmark NFT,gamehub bounty champian.Alla bounty champian.they kill the payment so we all report to the manager.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3479982https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2814494

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: You've been here on the forum for a long time, you've written over 1500 posts and still don't know how to write one meaningful post. I just took a cursory look at your posts, and you don't even know how to properly write a proof of auth post. you don't know how to find a link to your own profile  Quote from: Klp1122 on March 07, 2022, 09:08:36 AM#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: Klp1122Forum Profile Link : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=unreadTelegram Username: @Rasel2963Participated Campaigns: Twitter. TelegramBEF -20 Wallate Address : 0x5E71D25548720062e19d95dA11e5CE6eC7Cad093if you really want to make a complaint, there is a form here on how to do it, and you should also follow it. You rather chose to spam the forum, share this same post everywhere and expect someone to do research for you.Here is the scam report format https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=260073.0 make an effort at least once on this forum.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on March 08, 2023, 09:15:09 PMYou've been here on the forum for a long time, you've written over 1500 posts and still don't know how to write one meaningful post. I just took a cursory look at your posts, and you don't even know how to properly write a proof of auth post. you don't know how to find a link to your own profile  With zero merits on 350 activities I doubt if he knows the basic rules of Bitcointalk, he is one of the liabilities of Bitcointalk, has no contribution, and is quick to file a complaint when he is not making a profit from the bounty he is has worked or worked on, I hope these bounty hunters at least will get 5 merits before they participate in the bounty campaign to make them a real member of Bitcointalk.QuoteActivity: 350Merit: 0

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on March 08, 2023, 09:15:09 PMYou've been here on the forum for a long time, you've written over 1500 posts and still don't know how to write one meaningful post.Because making 10 bounty reports with the same format and social media link does not require and brain work  OP has been caught in the past cheating bounty campaigns with his alts and there is probably a chance some of his alts have not been paid and now he is bitter.If he doesn't share all the necessary information, no one is believing him here.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: All I know is the basic rule of a bounty campaign is not to allow cheaters to participate in the bounty campaign I don't know if the bounty campaigns you participated in have this rule, if you failed to read it then that could be the reason and if they allow you then this campaign is worthless for allowing cheaters to join the campaign.This is what shows up on your profile and it's coming from a respected bounty manager.QuoteAvoid associating your brand with this user, Bounty cheater with multiple alts.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: Klp1122 on March 08, 2023, 07:20:53 PMThis team doesn't give us any payment for our workI see that you have five negative trusts/ feedback from people, including Bounty managers such as BountyDetective and CryptopreneurBrainboss, stating that you are cheating in your Bounty campaigns that you work with by using multiple accounts. The bounty manager cannot pay you your rewards if you violate the terms and rules of the campaign or have done illegal methods. Before you blame the managers, you must blame yourself because they have the right to prevent you from any bounty campaigns you participate in or not distribute coins to you. Again, you have to abide by the rules of any bounty and not try to cheat, and you will receive your tokens in due time like other honest bounty hunters.
